p:
The distribution of articles by journal shows that Global Environment Change, Population and environment and Regional Enviornmental Change are the most influential in both databases (Table 7). This coincides with the thematic distribution presented above, in which the knowledge areas of environmental science is the most relevant in the field of migration and climate change. Table 7
